com.versant.util.backup
Class Options

java.lang.Object
  com.versant.util.backup.Options

public class Options
extends java.lang.Object

Contains the options information for backing up database/s, restoring, logging of database.

 void setAggression(java.lang.String value)
          Sets the number of seconds( to given value) to hold data in a buffer before writing to tape.
 void setBlocking(java.lang.String value)
          Sets blocking size ,the number of bytes to read or write at a time to the given value.
 void setCapacity(java.lang.String value)
          Sets the Capacity i.e. maximum number of bytes to write to the tape before requesting the next volume.

          Sets the level for backup
 void setOverwrite()
          Sets the "overwrite" option on when used in conjunction with restore, rename command.
 void setPosition(java.lang.String value)
          Sets the Position to value where the backup file should be read or written.
 void setRename(java.lang.String value)
          Sets the name of the database to which a restored database should be renamed.
 void setRollforward()
          Sets rollforward archiving on when used in conjunction with the backup command.
 void setStartsync()
          Starts synchronization, after the backup is completed and always used with O_VBACKUP_BACKUP when FTS is on if value passed is true.

setLevel

public void setLevel(java.lang.String value)
Sets the level for backup

Parameters:
value - value can be either 0,1 or 2. The default value is 0.

getLevel

public java.lang.String getLevel()
Returns the level of backup

Returns:
level of backup

removeLevel

public void removeLevel()
Removes the Level from the current Options.

setDevice

public void setDevice(java.lang.String value)
Sets the backup Device.

Parameters:
value - The backup device on which to read or write. The backup device can be either a tape drive or a normal file

getDevice

public java.lang.String getDevice()
                           throws java.lang.RuntimeException
Returns the device name.

Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException

removeDevice

public void removeDevice()
Removes the Device from the current Options.

setPosition

public void setPosition(java.lang.String value)
Sets the Position to value where the backup file should be read or written. The default is "0" i.e. the current position.

getPosition

public java.lang.String getPosition()
Returns the Position where the backup file should be read or written

removePosition

public void removePosition()
Removes the Position option from the current Options

setCapacity

public void setCapacity(java.lang.String value)
Sets the Capacity i.e. maximum number of bytes to write to the tape before requesting the next volume. The default unit is megabytes with the given value. The capacity as a string, can use 'K','M' or 'G' as abbreviations.

getCapacity

public java.lang.String getCapacity()
Returns the Capacity

removeCapacity

public void removeCapacity()
Removes the capacity option from the current Options

setBlocking

public void setBlocking(java.lang.String value)
Sets blocking size ,the number of bytes to read or write at a time to the given value.

getBlocking

public java.lang.String getBlocking()
Returns the Blocking size.

removeBlocking

public void removeBlocking()
Removes the blocking option from the current Options.

setComment

public void setComment(java.lang.String value)
Sets the comment with a backup. default is no comment

getComment

public java.lang.String getComment()
Returns the comment

removeComment

public void removeComment()
Removes the comment option from the current Options.

setRollforward

public void setRollforward()
Sets rollforward archiving on when used in conjunction with the backup command.

getRollforward

public boolean getRollforward()
Returns true if option Rollforward is set else returns false.

removeRollforward

public void removeRollforward()
Removes the Rollforward option from the current Options.

setStartsync

public void setStartsync()
Starts synchronization, after the backup is completed and always used with O_VBACKUP_BACKUP when FTS is on if value passed is true.

getStartsync

public boolean getStartsync()
returns true if option Startsync is set else return false.

removeStartsync

public void removeStartsync()
Removes the Startsync option from the current Options.

setAggression

public void setAggression(java.lang.String value)
Sets the number of seconds( to given value) to hold data in a buffer before writing to tape. The default is 60 seconds.

getAggression

public java.lang.String getAggression()
Returns the number of seconds to hold data in a buffer before writing to tape.

removeAggression

public void removeAggression()
Removes the Aggression from the current Options. default is 60 seconds

setRename

public void setRename(java.lang.String value)
Sets the name of the database to which a restored database should be renamed.

getRename

public java.lang.String getRename()
Returns the renamed database name

removeRename

public void removeRename()
Removes the renamed database option from current Options.

setOverwrite

public void setOverwrite()
Sets the "overwrite" option on when used in conjunction with restore, rename command.

getOverwrite

public boolean getOverwrite()
Returns true if option "overwrite" is set else returns false.

removeOverwrite

public void removeOverwrite()
Removes the Overwrite option from the current Options.
